meta.article_title: August 27, 2018 - Never Think About Winning or Losing While Playing - Excise the Thought and Play Well!

terminologie_extrait.contexte: During a point you have to let your subconscious take over - that's why you practice, to train it for exactly that, so let it do its job.

never-think-about-winning-or-losing.probleme: Thinking about winning or losing while playing

debutant: Make your primary goal to play well

exercices_complementaires.description: In fact, your sole thinking at the table should be tactical, though only between points.
